rows.label: bf06140190_0010
rows.name: You shouldn't be up.

rows.label: bf06140190_0020
rows.name:
It's only been one day...
Please don't strain yourself.

rows.label: bf06140190_0030
rows.name: Half a day off and look at all this paperwork!

rows.label: bf06140190_0040
rows.name: I swear, it's like they don't want me to sleep at all!

rows.label: bf06140190_0050
rows.name: Majesty...

rows.label: bf06140190_0060
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor.
I hereby issue you new orders.

rows.label: bf06140190_0070
rows.name:
It is my wish that you travel with the Holy Grail
as an emissary of the Empire.

rows.label: bf06140190_0080
rows.name:
Guard her and defend her against her enemies
until she reaches Luxuria.

rows.label: bf06140190_0090
rows.name: Guard...the Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf06140190_0100
rows.name: I've already discussed it with His Holiness.

rows.label: bf06140190_0110
rows.name:
Forgive me.
Your Majesty, I cannot accept.

rows.label: bf06140190_0120
rows.name: Just think about what happened yesterday!

rows.label: bf06140190_0130
rows.name:
It would be sheer foolishness
for me to leave your side!

rows.label: bf06140190_0140
rows.name: Is that really your true feelings?

rows.label: bf06140190_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Huh?

rows.label: bf06140190_0160
rows.name:
I can see it in your eyes.
You wish to travel alongisde the Holy Grail...

rows.label: bf06140190_0170
rows.name: or rather, with that boy,

rows.label: bf06140190_0180
rows.name: That's not-!

rows.label: bf06140190_0190
rows.name:
I am your...Special Inquisitor. Ensuring Your
Majesty's safety is my only concern.

rows.label: bf06140190_0200
rows.name: To abandon that duty and go traveling...

rows.label: bf06140190_0210
rows.name: Is this...Wadatsumi's...?

rows.label: bf06140190_0220
rows.name:
A Driver who cannot even protect
himself is no Driver at all.

rows.label: bf06140190_0230
rows.name:
Yesterday's events have made me keenly
aware that I have no aptitude for it.

rows.label: bf06140190_0240
rows.name: It will be of more use in your hands.

rows.label: bf06140190_0250
rows.name: Majesty...

rows.label: bf06140190_0260
rows.name: The world is changing, Meleph.

rows.label: bf06140190_0270
rows.name:
I trust you more than anyone to lend that boy
the wisdom and strength he will need.

rows.label: bf06140190_0280
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...

rows.label: bf06140190_0290
rows.name:
I miss it, you know.
Lake Yuutle, in Gula.

rows.label: bf06140190_0300
rows.name: ...What?

rows.label: bf06140190_0310
rows.name:
Remember when the two of us would shake off
the servants and go swimming there?

rows.label: bf06140190_0320
rows.name:
Ah... Yes.
Of course.

rows.label: bf06140190_0330
rows.name:
Kids from the nearby village would come too.
Good times.

rows.label: bf06140190_0340
rows.name: Majesty...

rows.label: bf06140190_0350
rows.name: If Superbia...

rows.label: bf06140190_0360
rows.name:
No, the whole of Alst could be like
that again... Wouldn't it be beautiful...?

rows.label: bf06140190_0370
rows.name: Is that my new duty, then?

rows.label: bf06140190_0380
rows.name:
In truth, it should have been you
sitting in this chair right now...

rows.label: bf06140190_0390
rows.name: The imperial line has always passed from father to son.

rows.label: bf06140190_0400
rows.name: On the day Your Majesty was born, that's exactly what happened.

rows.label: bf06140190_0410
rows.name: I knew that day would come. It came as no surprise.

rows.label: bf06140190_0420
rows.name:
You were raised by my father
as a boy to take the throne.

rows.label: bf06140190_0430
rows.name: While being the daughter of my Lord Uncle Eandraig.

rows.label: bf06140190_0440
rows.name: And I am grateful for it.

rows.label: bf06140190_0450
rows.name:
If not for him, I would never have met Kagutsuchi.
Never have met...them.

rows.label: bf06140190_0460
rows.name: I'd have missed out on so much.

rows.label: bf06140190_0470
rows.name: There. Those are your true feelings.

rows.label: bf06140190_0480
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]-!

rows.label: bf06140190_0490
rows.name: A magnificent power resides in you.

rows.label: bf06140190_0500
rows.name: Power like yours exists to be used justly.

rows.label: bf06140190_0510
rows.name: Nefer...

rows.label: bf06140190_0520
rows.name: You've been tied down long enough.

rows.label: bf06140190_0530
rows.name:
Follow your heart,
Meleph Lahat.

rows.label: bf06140190_0540
rows.name:
I have no words.
Thank you, Your Majesty.

rows.label: bf06140190_0550
rows.name: Very well, then.

rows.label: bf06140190_0560
rows.name: I hereby accept the task you have assigned to me.

rows.label: bf06140190_0570
rows.name:
That's the Meleph I know and love.
Make me proud.
